author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rogers Corp Reports Qtrly ‍Adjusted Earnings Of $1.36 Per Diluted Share​​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Rogers Corp:
* QTRLY ‍NET SALES OF $209.0 MILLION, UP 20.8%​ * QTRLY ‍EARNINGS OF $0.37 PER DILUTED SHARE​ * QTRLY ‍ADJUSTED EARNINGS OF $1.36 PER DILUTED SHARE​ * ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, ROGERS EXPECTS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE IN A RANGE OF $50 TO $60 MILLION​
* ‍ROGERS GUIDES ITS 2018 Q1 NET SALES TO A RANGE OF $208 TO $218 MILLION​
* ‍ROGERS GUIDES ITS 2018 Q1 EARNINGS TO A RANGE OF $1.15 TO $1.30 PER DILUTED SHARE​
* ‍ROGERS GUIDES ITS 2018 Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS ARE GUIDED TO A RANGE OF $1.30 TO $1.45 PER DILUTED SHARE​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.42, REVENUE VIEW $206.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.55, REVENUE VIEW $221.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
